select m.member_name member_name,mv.movie_title movie_title,ml.mylists_name mylists_name, lcate.list_category_name list_category_name,mv.movie_image movie_image
from list_table a , member m, movie mv ,mylists ml,list_category lcate where m.member_id = #{userId} and ml.member_number = (select member_number from member where member_id = #{userId}) and a.movie_number = mv.movie_number and ml.mylists_number = a.mylists_number and lcate.list_category_number = a.list_category_number order by mylists_name
select mylists_name,mylists_number from mylists where member_number = (select member_number from member where member_id = #{userId}) order by mylists_number desc
